title: US to sell bombs to Canada in $2.7-bn deal
description: America has approved a significant arms sale to Canada. The United States will provide bombs worth $2.68 billion. This comes as Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney boosts defense spending. Canada is increasing its military budget to meet NATO targets. This mo…
content: The United States said Thursday it had approved a $2.68-billion sale of bombs to Canada, where Prime Minister Mark Carney is sharply expanding defense spending amid uncertainties over relations with … [+1325 chars]
